value.title: Abu Dhabi's Etihad Airways taps Microsoft to modernise its finance operations
value.excerpt: Etihad Airways has turned to Microsoft AI to transform its Finance Operations, which is comprised of the company’s Finance and Digital, Technology and Innovation divisions. The move saw the Abu Dhabi-based carrier work with Microsoft to modernise its payment inspection process using cognitive services.

value.title: New Global Rackspace Technology Study Uncovers Widespread Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Knowledge Gap
